description: This article delves into how the Trump administration's policies affected open source licensing. It discusses trade policies, net neutrality repeal, immigration constraints, government use of open source, and security implications, emphasizing their influence on the open source community.
keywords: Trump administration, open source licensing, trade policies, net neutrality, immigration policies, government open source, software security, intellectual property, international collaboration, open source innovation
title: The Impact of Trump Administration Policies on Open Source Licensing
